description: Travel in style in this classic shirt made from a cool hemp blend. Comfort fit that lets air circulate and the fabric’s uneven structure lifts it away from the skin for extra ventilation and a cool feel. In addition, the hemp has a natural resistance against microorganisms – a plus in tropical climates. A cool, airy travel favourite that will help you keep your head cool even on really hot days.
name: Fjallraven Ovik Travel SS Shirt - Mens
